nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: an endtable
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want an endtable to put my stuff on. Material and quality don't matter.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: an endtable and a dresser
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want an endtable and a dresser. Material and quality don't matter.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: two endtables and two dressers
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want lots of furniture. Two endtables for my bed, and two dresser. Material and quality don't matter.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: two endtables and two dressers, excellent quality or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want lots of furniture. Two endtables and two dressers. Material doesn't matter, but they need to be excellent quality or better.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: two endtables and two dressers, masterwork quality or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want lots of furniture. Two endtables and two dressers. Material doesn't matter, but they need to be masterwork quality or better.
